CodeBlockMethod.Name: InitItem
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.ItemIndex = itemIndex
-- 드롭된 아이템이 어떤 모습으로 보일지 스프라이트 설정 local sprite = self.Entity.SpriteRendererComponent local itemDataSet = _DataService:GetTable("ItemDataSet_1") local ruid = itemDataSet:GetRow(self.ItemIndex):GetItem("IconRUID") sprite.SpriteRUID = ruid

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self:IsClient() then self:OnBeginPlayClient() else self:OnBeginPlayServer() end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlayClient
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- Tween local totalTweenTime = self.DropTweenTime local jumpHeight = 1.1 -- 아이템 드롭될 때 jumpHeight 만큼 위로 한번 붕 뜨도록 함 local tween = _TweenLogic:MoveOffset(self.Entity, Vector2(0, jumpHeight), totalTweenTime / 2, EaseType.QuadEaseOut) -- 올라간 만큼 내려오도록 함 tween:SetOnEndCallback(function() local tween2 = _TweenLogic:MoveOffset(self.Entity, Vector2(0, -jumpHeight), totalTweenTime / 2, EaseType.QuadEaseIn) tween2:SetOnEndCallback(function() self.Entity.TweenFloatingComponent.Enable = true end) end)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlayServer
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- Tween이 끝난 후에 TriggerComponent 활성화 _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(function() self.Entity.TriggerComponent.Enable = true end, self.DropTweenTime + 0.1)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- --아이템 엔티티와 충돌한 엔티티의 인벤토리를 받고, 인벤토리가 없으면 리턴 local inventory = TriggerBodyEntity.LiteInventory local stat = self.Entity.PlayerStat
if inventory == nil then return end
-- 아이템 개수 변경 처리를 위해 ModifyItem() 함수 호출 inventory:ModifyItem(self.ItemIndex, 1)
if TriggerBodyEntity.Name == "model://maplestoryitem$0261ec56323b449fb2a8e80731ab9a4e" then stat:UpExp()
end
-- 충돌한 아이템 엔티티는 파괴 self.Entity:Destroy()
